nars.util

Class PrintWriterInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.io.Symbols
      • nars.io.TextInput
        • nars.util.PrintWriterInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KIFInput, OWLInput, XMLInput

    public class PrintWriterInput
extends TextInput
    Creates a PrintWriter that pipes into a TextInput's BufferedReader. Useful for TextInput implementations that dynamically generate new input from Java execution.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class nars.io.Symbols
